title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning System Design for Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain science experiment procedures with 90% accuracy using a mobile microlearning system.
Learners can complete science project assignments through online collaboration with peer learners.
Learners can propose three or more criteria for evaluating the accessibility of learning content and technological integration in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
